name: Neverlose.money
intro: Gamified HODL protocol for long-term investors
introduce: Neverlose.money is a gamified HODL protocol for long-term investors that pays a bonus to the winners with the losers penalty, holdlers lock-up their long-term assets with a set period. If holdlers fail and withdraw your fund before the due, holdlers should pay 10% penalty that goes other holdlers.
